verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, [or] Song לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> le-Yom day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat. for the sabbath ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov, [It is a] good לְהֹד֥וֹת <S%H3034><s%> le-ho-Dot [thing] to give thanks לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD וּלְזַמֵּ֖ר <S%H2167><s%> u-le-zam-Mer and to sing praises לְשִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> le-shim-Cha unto thy name עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon. O most High

לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> le-hag-Gid To shew forth בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker in the morning חַסְֽדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha; thy lovingkindness וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <S%H530><s%> ve-'e-mu-na-te-cha, and thy faithfulness בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <S%H3915><s%> bal-lei-Lot. every night

עֲ‍ ֽלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> 'alei- with עָ֭שׂוֹר <S%H6218><s%> 'A-sor Upon an instrument of ten strings וַעֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> va-'a-lei- and with נָ֑בֶל <S%H5035><s%> Na-vel; and upon the psaltery עֲלֵ֖י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei with הִגָּי֣וֹן <S%H1902><s%> hig-ga-Yon with a solemn sound בְּכִנּֽוֹר׃ <S%H3658><s%> be-chin-Nor. upon the harp

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שִׂמַּחְתַּ֣נִי <S%H8055><s%> sim-mach-Ta-ni hast made me glad יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For thou LORD בְּפָעֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6467><s%> be-fo-'o-Le-cha; through thy work בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖י <S%H4639><s%> be-ma-'a-Sei in the works יָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dei-cha of thy hands אֲרַנֵּֽן׃ <S%H7442><s%> 'a-ran-Nen. I will triumph

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- How גָּדְל֣וּ <S%H1431><s%> ga-de-Lu how great מַעֲשֶׂ֣יךָ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei-cha are thy works יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; O LORD מְ֝אֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, are very עָמְק֥וּ <S%H6009><s%> 'a-me-Ku deep מַחְשְׁבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4284><s%> mach-she-vo-Tei-cha. [and] thy thoughts

אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- man בַּ֭עַר <S%H1198><s%> Ba-'ar A brutish לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo no יֵדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> ye-Da'; knoweth וּ֝כְסִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> u-che-Sil, not neither doth a fool לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor יָבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> ya-Vin understand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> Zot. likewise

בִּפְרֹ֤חַ <S%H6524><s%> bif-Ro-ach spring רְשָׁעִ֨ים׀ <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im When the wicked כְּמ֥וֹ <S%H3644><s%> ke-Mo like עֵ֗שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> 'E-sev, as the grass וַ֭יָּצִיצוּ <S%H6692><s%> Vai-ya-tzi-tzu do flourish כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> Po-'a-lei and when all the workers אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven; of iniquity לְהִשָּֽׁמְדָ֥ם <S%H8045><s%> le-hish-sha-me-Dam [it is] that they shall be destroyed עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> 'a-dei- for ever עַֽד׃ <S%H5704><s%> 'Ad. against
וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you מָר֗וֹם <S%H4791><s%> ma-Rom, [art most] high לְעֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for evermore יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. But thou LORD

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For הִנֵּ֪ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold אֹיְבֶ֡יךָ׀ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha For lo thine enemies יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold אֹיְבֶ֣יךָ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha for lo thine enemies יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <S%H6><s%> yo-Ve-du; shall perish יִ֝תְפָּרְד֗וּ <S%H6504><s%> yit-pa-re-Du, shall be scattered כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> Po-'a-lei all the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven. of iniquity

וַתָּ֣רֶם <S%H7311><s%> vat-Ta-rem shalt thou exalt כִּרְאֵ֣ים <S%H7214><s%> kir-'Eim like [the horn of] an unicorn קַרְנִ֑י <S%H7161><s%> kar-Ni; But my horn בַּ֝לֹּתִ֗י <S%H1101><s%> bal-lo-Ti, I shall be anointed בְּשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> be-She-men oil רַעֲנָֽן׃ <S%H7488><s%> ra-'a-Nan. with fresh

וַתַּבֵּ֥ט <S%H5027><s%> vat-tab-Bet also shall see עֵינִ֗י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni, Mine eye בְּשׁ֫וּרָ֥י <S%H7790><s%> be-Shu-Rai [my desire] on mine enemies בַּקָּמִ֖ים <S%H6965><s%> bak-ka-Mim that rise up עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai against מְרֵעִ֗ים <S%H7489><s%> me-re-'Im, [my desire] of the wicked תִּשְׁמַ֥עְנָה <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma'-nah shall hear אָזְנָֽי׃ <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-Nai. [and] mine ears

צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-dik The righteous כַּתָּמָ֣ר <S%H8558><s%> kat-ta-Mar like the palm tree יִפְרָ֑ח <S%H6524><s%> yif-Rach; shall flourish כְּאֶ֖רֶז <S%H730><s%> ke-'E-rez like a cedar בַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן <S%H3844><s%> bal-le-va-Non in Lebanon יִשְׂגֶּֽה׃ <S%H7685><s%> yis-Geh. he shall grow

שְׁ֭תוּלִים <S%H8362><s%> tu-lim Those that be planted בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD בְּחַצְר֖וֹת <S%H2691><s%> be-chatz-Rot in the courts אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu of our God יַפְרִֽיחוּ׃ <S%H6524><s%> yaf-Ri-chu. shall flourish

ע֭וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od will still יְנוּב֣וּן <S%H5107><s%> ye-nu-Vun They shall still bring forth fruit בְּשֵׂיבָ֑ה <S%H7872><s%> be-sei-Vah; in old age דְּשֵׁנִ֖ים <S%H1879><s%> de-she-Nim they shall be fat וְרַֽעֲנַנִּ֣ים <S%H7488><s%> ve-ra-'a-nan-Nim and flourishing יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu. become

לְ֭הַגִּיד <S%H5046><s%> Le-hag-gid To shew כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָשָׁ֣ר <S%H3477><s%> ya-Shar [is] upright יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; that the LORD צ֝וּרִ֗י <S%H6697><s%> tzu-Ri, [he is] my rock וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- is no; עֹלָתָה 'o-la-tah כעַוְלָ֥תָה <S%H5766><s%> 'av-La-tah iniquity קבּֽוֹ׃ bo.
